title: Blue Tongue
creator_contributor_role: VCA Film and Television School, University of Melbourne, production company
abstract: On the fringes of a housing estate a girl seduces a boy with a secret she will only reveal in exchange for his love. When the boy fails to honour the pact, what he holds close is threatened by the girl's desire for revenge.
description: On the fringes of a housing estate a girl seduces a boy with a secret she will only reveal in exchange for his love. When the boy fails to honour the pact, what he holds close is threatened by the girl's desire for revenge. Cast: Arlan Fahey Leigh and Siana Smit. In 2005 'Blue Tongue' was the first Australian short film to be selected for screening at the International Critics Week at the Cannes International Film Festival.
